General.Name: India Pesticides Limited
General.Description: India Pesticides Limited operates as an agrochemical company in India. The company manufactures, sells, and distributes fungicides, herbicides, insecticides, and various agrochemical products, as well as active pharmaceutical ingredients for use in pharmaceutical drugs. It exports its products to approximately 29 countries. India Pesticides Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Lucknow, India.
General.Address: Swarup Cold Storage Compound, Lucknow, India, 226004
